Key:
Excuse me! Rinne-san, has Kotori come he...
Oh. No one's here.
Translation: ¡Disculpe! Rinne-san, Kotori ha venido...  Oh. No hay nadie aquí.

Key:
I guess I can call her cell.
I wonder what Kotori's up to.
Translation: Supongo que puedo llamarla al móvil.  Me pregunto qué estará haciendo Kotori.

Key: Oh? What's up, Onii-chan?
Where are you?
Ah, you should guess! Where am I?!
Well, I'd guess home or school... so school!
Translation: Bueno, supongo que en casa o en la escuela... ¡así que en la escuela!

Key: Haha! You're right! I'm at school!
How did you know?
I can see right through ya.
Translation: Puedo ver a través de ti.

Key: Ah. Amazing as usual, Onii-chan. Bye!
Hey! W-Wait... don't hang up!
Goodness. What is it?
Do you have a minute to talk?
Hm. I'm kind of busy... what is it?

Ah, well, it's okay. I was just wondering if you
wanted to go shopping with me.
Translation: Ah, bueno, está bien. Me preguntaba si querías ir de compras conmigo.

Key: Are you asking me out on a date?
Well... yeah. I guess I am.
You seem a little busy though...
No, I'm fine. I'm sure I'll be good today!
Translation: No, estoy bien. ¡Seguro que hoy estaré bien!

Key: Y-Yeah? Did you want to meet in front of the station?
Translation: ¿Sí? ¿Querías que nos viéramos delante de la estación?

Key: Got it! If you're later than me we'll play\nthe punishment game!
Translation: ¡Ya está! ¡Si llegas más tarde que yo jugaremos al juego del castigo!

Key: What? P-Punishment game?

Wow... Kotori, what kind of date would play
the punishment game? I've gotta hurry.
Translation: Vaya... Kotori, ¿qué clase de cita jugaría el juego del castigo? Tengo que darme prisa.

Key:
*pant* *pant*
I somehow managed to get here before her...
Translation: *pant* *pant* De alguna manera me las arreglé para llegar aquí antes que ella...

Key:
Out of breath in the middle of the afternoon?
You're like a little gremlin.
Translation: ¿Sin aliento a media tarde?  Eres como un pequeño gremlin.

Key: Seriously? That's how you greet me?

Oh, some attitude on you. Well, maybe I should
just let you let out your pervertedness in public.
Translation: Qué actitud la tuya. Bueno, tal vez debería dejar que dejes salir tu perversión en público.

Key: That so? Oh... I thought you had a white ribbon on.
Translation: ¿Es así? Oh... Pensé que llevabas un lazo blanco.

Key: What? Is that a problem?

No. When I called you, it was white. It's not a bad
thing. No matter which one you wear, you're still you.
Translation: No. Cuando te llamé, era blanco. No es algo malo. No importa cuál lleves, sigues siendo tú.

Key: Yeah... that's okay then.

Forget the ribbon. Why did you change?
I thought you were coming from school.
Translation: Olvídate de la cinta. ¿Por qué te has cambiado?  Pensé que venías de la escuela.

Key:
Isn't this a date? Of course I'd dress
up for this...
Translation: ¿No es una cita? Por supuesto que me vestiría para esto...

Key: Mm...? Did you say something?
...Nothing.
So?
So what?

So where are we going? This is a date, right?
Take me somewhere already.
Translation: Entonces, ¿a dónde vamos? Esto es una cita, ¿verdad?  Llévame ya a algún sitio.

Key:
O-Oh, yeah. Right.
Uh...
What? You didn't plan anything?
T-That's not true! The plan today... is...
Translation: ¡E-Eso no es verdad! El plan de hoy... es...

Key: Wanna go to a diner or something?
Translation: ¿Quieres ir a una cafetería o algo?

Key:
I didn't have high expectations, but even
that is a bit of a let down.
Translation: No tenía grandes expectativas, pero incluso eso es un poco decepcionante.

Key: Ha... haha...
Well, let's get going.
What? You're okay with the diner?
Translation: ¿Qué? ¿Te parece bien lo de la cafetería?

Key:
You're the one who's taking me.
I have no say in the matter.
Translation: Eres tú quien me lleva.  No tengo nada que decir al respecto.

Key: I-I see...
Hm?
Hey, Shin... Do you happen to be with Kotori?
Translation: Oye, Shin... ¿Por casualidad estás con Kotori?

Key: Huh? Y-Yeah, but...
I knew it. Kotori had cut off her transmission,\nso I had a feeling that was a case.
Translation: Lo sabía. Kotori había cortado su transmisión, así que tuve la sensación de que era un caso.

Key: What are you talking about?
Nothing. I wanted to get a hold of Kotori but\nI couldn't get a hold of her. I figured she had\nbusiness and that she didn't want to be bothered.
Translation: Nada. Quise hablar con Kotori pero no pude. Me imaginé que estaba ocupada y que no quería ser molestada.

Key: I-I see...
Can you tell Kotori that Kannazuki said he\nwants you over to Fraxinus immediately?
Translation: ¿Puedes decirle a Kotori que Kannazuki dijo que te entregara a Fraxinus inmediatamente?

Key: I personally don't want to get in the way of you...\nbut supposedly he has something to report right away.
Translation: Personalmente no quiero entrometerme...\Npero supuestamente tiene algo que informar de inmediato.

Key: Okay, got it. I'll let her know.
Translation: Vale, entendido. Se lo haré saber.

Key: What is it?

Oh. Reine just called. She said that Kannazuki-san
had an emergency report and he wants you to head
to the Fraxinus immediately...
Translation: Oh. Reine acaba de llamar. Dijo que Kannazuki-san tenía un informe de emergencia y quiere que te dirijas al Fraxinus inmediatamente...

Key: I see. We're going to have to cut our date short.
Translation: Ya veo. Vamos a tener que acortar nuestra cita.

Key: Y-Yeah. I guess so.
Well, I'll head back now. Sorry about that.
Translation: Bueno, ahora me vuelvo. Lo siento.

Key: Yeah...

We were just about to go on our date.
She's always so busy...
Translation: Estábamos a punto de ir a nuestra cita.  Siempre está tan ocupada...
